document.p: The DECT tab on the Telephony page contains the following sections:
document.li1:
Pairing
Allows you to connect a DECT phone to the 's DECT base station. Proceed as follows:
document.step2: If desired, change the access code. This is the PIN code that you will have to enter on the DECT handset.
Start registration mode (pairing) on your DECT handset.
If prompted for a PIN code, enter the access code.
document.li1:
Paging
When you start the paging function, all registered DECT handsets will start to ring (if the sound is not muted) and display a paging message. This function is very useful for finding back a misplaced DECT handset.
document.indent1: To start the paging function, click Start under Paging. As soon as you located the phone, click Stop.
document.li2: Provides an overview of the available DECT connections. The allows you to connect up to 6 DECT phones.
Allows you to unregister a DECT phone. Proceed as follows to do this:
document.step3: In the Handset Name list, select the DECT phone that you want to unregister or select ALL to unregister all DECT phones.
